not_found:
Command not found.
/info - list of available commands
info_description:
Welcome to the telegram bot. It will help you get rid of doomscrolling and read books that you have always put off until later. Here are the commands that will come in handy:
/{} - call this message
welcome:
Welcome to the telegram bot. It will help you get rid of doomscrolling and read books that you have always put off until later. Here are the commands that will come in handy:
/info - call this message

Books:
/list_books - list of books
/read - getting the current page
/set_book - select a book
/edit_book_name - change the name of the book
/delete_book - delete a book

Pages
/set_page - go to page

Notes
/list_notes - list of notes
/create_note - create a note
/delete_note - delete notes

Settings
/set_lang - interface language
/set_chars_on_page - number of characters on page
To download the book, simply send the file
chars_on_page: Enter the number of characters to be displayed on the page:
chars_on_page_q: Enter the number of characters to be displayed on the page:
chars_on_page_success: Value updated. The number of characters on the page is {}.
heavy_file:
The file could not be loaded.
Current file size limit: {}.
file_strart_downloading: We are starting to download the book..
upload_book_success: The book '{}' has been successfully downloaded.

del_notes_success: The selected notes have been successfully deleted.
